details.title: Theory of Operation of an Elastically Supported Tuned Gyroscope
details.abstract: Detailed derivation of the transfer function for a multigimbal, elastically supported, tuned gyro is presented and comparison made between its characteristics and those of a classical two-axis, free-rotor gyro. Knowledge of the gyro transfer function is necessary for the purpose of servo analysis of the system in which the gyro is used; also, the transfer function is a basis of evaluation of errors caused by angular inputs that occur at twice spin frequency.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
